FlavorText.Text: [L_LeaderName]. The Eldritch hunger is upon you. The [L_FactionName] are the next victims of my red legions!
I shall toy with you no longer, [L_LeaderName]. My hungry armies march to feed upon you in war!
In the name of [S_FactionShortName] and the coming Paradise, we now make war upon you!
Trespasser! Do not these soldiers follow the orders of [L_LeaderName]? Withdraw your minions or I shall consume them.
You trespass on the ground of [S_FactionShortName]. Begone now, or face endless torture and suffering.
This is Nervari, [L_FactionShortName]! Remember, we were chosen of Curgen once. Our numbers are not great, but our warriors are unmatched. Watch your every step.
[L_LeaderName]? We are the apex of Quendar indeed, yet we are sorry for their deeds. But we are NOT weak! Know this well and plan accordingly.
[L_LeaderName]? What is wealth against might? We are the apex of flesh: know this well and plan accordingly.
[L_LeaderName]? You are of stout body. Do not think that you can match ours, however. Know this well and plan accordingly.
[L_LeaderName]? Oh Queen, though your namesake Titan was slain by Curgen, we're not your enemies now. We are Curgen's children indeed, but in flesh, not in spirit.
[L_LeaderName]? Songs say your people can fight well. Do not think for a moment that you are the equal of the Quendar.
[L_LeaderName] of the Kraxis. How ironic, they call both us the traitors. But you are no match for us. Bow before the might of the Quendar!
[L_LeaderName]. You all carry the curse of Curgen, his endless hunger and fire. It will consume you, if we shall not destroy you before that.
[L_LeaderName]? You are Curgen's final legacy to this world. But remember that the Quendar were his prized people, his best creation. Fear our wrath!
[L_LeaderName]? Curgen cast your people aside. And the Quendar were his prized people, his best creation. Fear our wrath!
We greet you, [L_FactionShortName]. Do not waste our time. The trial pits will soon be attended.
You stand in [S_FactionShortName], [L_LeaderName]. Quendar respect only strength and honor.
Greetings, [L_FactionShortName]. State your business succinctly. The trial pits will soon be full.
You stand in [S_FactionShortName], [L_LeaderName]. Make yourself worthy of valuable Quendar attention.
Speak! Our trial pits shall soon be filled with blood, revealing the strongest.
Ah and old friend... old enemy, [L_LeaderName]. Mess with the Lord of Imperium once again, traitor, and your death will painfull. Keep to your place in the world, and I'll leave you... for now.
Do not think you can fool me again, [L_LeaderName]. We have NOTHING in common.
Do not think you can fool me again, [L_LeaderName]. Speak your business now or leave before I changed my mind.
Your treachery was a disgrace to all of us. It's time to clean up the world ... to purify it with your tainted blood. I declare war upon your people!
